name: Castle Defense (Sakelarov)
description:
A defense type of game where you have waves of incoming enemies trying to reach and destroy your Castle.

Your goal is to kill the enemies before they destroy your Castle. You use the mouse to shoot arrows and later in the game button X will also be used to shoot additional projectiles.

The game allows you to buy 3 types of units, each with a separate abilities and upgrades. There are 3 difficulty levels - you will need some prior practise and advances planning/ strategies in order to defeat the hard mode.

Feel free to leave a comment or to report a bug.
